name: Ravenous Dragon
description:
In this game you will have to touch the enemies to kill them and get some meat to survive.

At the end of each level there is a portal that will teleport you to the next one.

The game is currently in a early stage of development but there is some future features defined:

  • Main menu with graphic settings, save games and more
  • Optimisation
  • Run exp gaining when eating to expend on upgrades. Lost on death
  • Global exp gaining when eating to expend on upgrades. These upgrades unlock skills to be pursached with the run exp or upgrade the character/unlocked skills
  • New enemies
  • New unlockable characters with different skills
  • More maps
  • More to come...
